Articles.Content:
Hey guys, last night's stream was a blast! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

In case you didn't make it, here is the VOD:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sjVzRE5Olpo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Next stream will happen next week on Saturday june 20th, with a mission from our very own Kasper who is sending us to Dres! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

[More info here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/calendar.php?do=getinfo&e=187&day=2015-6-20)
